alert.note: Alert for Delta; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 3:22PM EDT until November 06 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. Expect the strongest wind gusts, up to 60 mph, to occur between 6 PM and 8 PM EDT. These strongest gusts will also occur along the shores of Big Bay de Noc, across the Garden Peninsula and near the Lake Michigan shore of Schoolcraft County. After 8 PM EDT, expect wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Delta and Southern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
